Package space.sunqian.common.codec

Class CryptoKit

public class CryptoKit extends Object
Utilities for crypto.

  • Method Details

    • cipherTransformer

      @Nonnull public static @Nonnull ByteTransformer cipherTransformer(@Nonnull @Nonnull Cipher cipher)
      Returns a new ByteTransformer instance for the specified Cipher. The transformer uses Cipher.doFinal(ByteBuffer, ByteBuffer) to process the input data, and the input data is considered as a block that needs to be encoded/decoded.

      If the cipher requires a specified input length, try using ByteProcessor.readBlockSize(int) or ByteTransformer.withFixedSize(ByteTransformer, int) to configure it.

      Parameters:
      cipher - the specified Cipher, should be initialized
      Returns:
      a new ByteTransformer instance for the specified Cipher

    • macTransformer

      @Nonnull public static @Nonnull ByteTransformer macTransformer(@Nonnull @Nonnull Mac mac)
      Returns a new ByteTransformer instance for the specified Mac. The transformer uses Mac.update(ByteBuffer) and Mac.doFinal() to process the input data, and before the end is true, the transformer returns null.

      If the digest requires a specified input length, try using ByteProcessor.readBlockSize(int) or ByteTransformer.withFixedSize(ByteTransformer, int) to configure it.

      Parameters:
      mac - the specified Mac, should be initialized
      Returns:
      a new ByteTransformer instance for the specified Mac
